mn83:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā mithilāyaṃ viharati maghadevaambavane.
mn83:3.3: Atha kho bhagavā aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
mn83:3.5: “ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya?
mn83:3.7: Atha kho āyasmā ānando ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn83:3.8: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya?
mn83:4.1: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, ānanda, imissāyeva mithilāyaṃ rājā ahosi maghadevo nāma dhammiko dhammarājā dhamme ṭhito mahārājā;
mn83:4.2: dhammaṃ carati brāhmaṇagahapatikesu negamesu ceva jānapadesu ca;
mn83:4.3: uposathañca upavasati cātuddasiṃ pañcadasiṃ aṭṭhamiñca pakkhassa.
mn83:4.4: Atha kho, ānanda, rājā maghadevo bahūnaṃ vassānaṃ bahūnaṃ vassasatānaṃ bahūnaṃ vassasahassānaṃ accayena kappakaṃ āmantesi:
mn83:4.5: ‘yadā me, samma kappaka, passeyyāsi sirasmiṃ palitāni jātāni, atha me āroceyyāsī’ti.
mn83:4.6: ‘Evaṃ, devā’ti kho, ānanda, kappako rañño maghadevassa paccassosi.
mn83:4.7: Addasā kho, ānanda, kappako bahūnaṃ vassānaṃ bahūnaṃ vassasatānaṃ bahūnaṃ vassasahassānaṃ accayena rañño maghadevassa sirasmiṃ palitāni jātāni.
mn83:4.9: ‘pātubhūtā kho devassa devadūtā, dissanti sirasmiṃ palitāni jātānī’ti.
mn83:4.10: ‘Tena hi, samma kappaka, tāni palitāni sādhukaṃ saṇḍāsena uddharitvā mama añjalismiṃ patiṭṭhāpehī’ti.
mn83:4.11: ‘Evaṃ, devā’ti kho, ānanda, kappako rañño maghadevassa paṭissutvā tāni palitāni sādhukaṃ saṇḍāsena uddharitvā rañño maghadevassa añjalismiṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
mn83:5.1: Atha kho, ānanda, rājā maghadevo kappakassa gāmavaraṃ datvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ kumāraṃ āmantāpetvā etadavoca:
mn83:5.4: bhuttā kho pana me mānusakā kāmā;
mn83:5.6: Ehi tvaṃ, tāta kumāra, imaṃ rajjaṃ paṭipajja.
mn83:5.7: Ahaṃ pana kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajissāmi.
mn83:5.8: Tena hi, tāta kumāra, yadā tvampi passeyyāsi sirasmiṃ palitāni jātāni, atha kappakassa gāmavaraṃ datvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ kumāraṃ sādhukaṃ rajje samanusāsitvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyāsi.
mn83:5.9: Yena me idaṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ anuppavatteyyāsi, mā kho me tvaṃ antimapuriso ahosi.
mn83:5.10: Yasmiṃ kho, tāta kumāra, purisayuge vattamāne evarūpassa kalyāṇassa vattassa samucchedo hoti so tesaṃ antimapuriso hoti.
mn83:5.11: Taṃ tāhaṃ, tāta kumāra, evaṃ vadāmi—
mn83:5.12: yena me idaṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ anuppavatteyyāsi, mā kho me tvaṃ antimapuriso ahosī’ti.

mn83:7.1: Rājā kho panānanda, maghadevo caturāsītivassasahassāni kumārakīḷitaṃ kīḷi, caturāsītivassasahassāni oparajjaṃ kāresi, caturāsītivassasahassāni rajjaṃ kāresi, caturāsītivassasahassāni imasmiṃyeva maghadevaambavane agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito brahmacariyamacari.
mn83:7.2: So cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā brahmalokūpago ahosi.

mn83:11.2: Te mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā vihariṃsu, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ;
mn83:11.3: iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā vihariṃsu.
mn83:11.6: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā vihariṃsu, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ;
mn83:11.7: iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā vihariṃsu.
mn83:11.8: Caturāsītivassasahassāni kumārakīḷitaṃ kīḷiṃsu, caturāsītivassasahassāni oparajjaṃ kāresuṃ, caturāsītivassasahassāni rajjaṃ kāresuṃ, caturāsītivassasahassāni imasmiṃyeva maghadevaambavane agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā brahmacariyamacariṃsu.
mn83:11.9: Te cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā brahmalokūpagā ahesuṃ.
mn83:11.10: Nimi tesaṃ rājā pacchimako ahosi dhammiko dhammarājā dhamme ṭhito mahārājā;
mn83:11.11: dhammaṃ carati brāhmaṇagahapatikesu negamesu ceva jānapadesu ca;
mn83:11.12: uposathañca upavasati cātuddasiṃ pañcadasiṃ aṭṭhamiñca pakkhassa.
mn83:12.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, ānanda, devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sudhammāyaṃ sabhāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
mn83:12.2: ‘lābhā vata, bho, videhānaṃ, suladdhaṃ vata, bho, videhānaṃ, yesaṃ nimi rājā dhammiko dhammarājā dhamme ṭhito mahārājā;
mn83:12.3: dhammaṃ carati brāhmaṇagahapatikesu negamesu ceva jānapadesu ca;
mn83:12.4: uposathañca upavasati cātuddasiṃ pañcadasiṃ aṭṭhamiñca pakkhassā’ti.
mn83:12.5: Atha kho, ānanda, sakko devānamindo deve tāvatiṃse āmantesi:
mn83:12.6: ‘iccheyyātha no tumhe, mārisā, nimiṃ rājānaṃ daṭṭhun’ti?
mn83:12.8: Tena kho pana, ānanda, samayena nimi rājā tadahuposathe pannarase sīsaṃnhāto uposathiko uparipāsādavaragato nisinno hoti.
mn83:12.10: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
mn83:12.12: devesu tāvatiṃsesu antarahito nimissa rañño pamukhe pāturahosi.
mn83:12.13: Atha kho, ānanda, sakko devānamindo nimiṃ rājānaṃ etadavoca:
mn83:12.15: Devā, mahārāja, tāvatiṃsā sudhammāyaṃ sabhāyaṃ kittayamānarūpā sannisinnā:
mn83:12.16: “lābhā vata, bho, videhānaṃ, suladdhaṃ vata, bho, videhānaṃ, yesaṃ nimi rājā dhammiko dhammarājā dhamme ṭhito mahārājā;

mn83:12.20: Tassa te ahaṃ, mahārāja, sahassayuttaṃ ājaññarathaṃ pahiṇissāmi;

mn83:15.10: Nimissa kho panānanda, rañño kaḷārajanako nāma putto ahosi.
mn83:16.1: Siyā kho pana te, ānanda, evamassa:
mn83:16.2: ‘añño nūna tena samayena rājā maghadevo ahosi, yena taṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitan’ti.
mn83:16.3: Na kho panetaṃ, ānanda, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
mn83:16.4: Ahaṃ tena samayena rājā maghadevo ahosiṃ.
mn83:16.5: Ahaṃ taṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihiniṃ, mayā taṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ;
mn83:16.7: Taṃ kho panānanda, kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattati, yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā.
mn83:16.8: Idaṃ kho panānanda, etarahi mayā kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn83:16.9: Katamañcānanda, etarahi mayā kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati?
mn83:16.11: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
mn83:16.12: Idaṃ kho, ānanda, etarahi mayā kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn83:16.13: Taṃ vo ahaṃ, ānanda, evaṃ vadāmi:
mn83:16.14: ‘yena me idaṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ anuppavatteyyātha, mā kho me tumhe antimapurisā ahuvattha’.
mn83:16.15: Yasmiṃ kho, ānanda, purisayuge vattamāne evarūpassa kalyāṇassa vattassa samucchedo hoti so tesaṃ antimapuriso hoti.
mn83:16.16: Taṃ vo ahaṃ, ānanda, evaṃ vadāmi:
mn83:16.17: ‘yena me idaṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ anuppavatteyyātha, mā kho me tumhe antimapurisā ahuvatthā’”ti.
mn83:17.2: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
